name: Create a YouTube Playlist
description: Learn how to create and organize a new playlist on YouTube
prerequisites: Be signed into your YouTube account

steps.title: Go to Your Library
steps.instruction: Click on 'Library' in the left sidebar

steps.title: Find Playlists Section
steps.instruction: Scroll down to find the 'Playlists' section
steps.extraContext: If you don't see a Playlists section, you might need to create your first playlist

steps.title: Name Your Playlist
steps.instruction: Enter a name for your playlist

steps.title: Choose Privacy Setting
steps.instruction: Choose whether your playlist is Public, Unlisted, or Private
steps.extraContext: Public = Anyone can search and view, Unlisted = Only people with link can view, Private = Only you can view

steps.title: Playlist Created!
steps.instruction: Your playlist has been created. You can now start adding videos to it.
steps.extraContext: To add videos, search for videos and click the 'Save' button, then select this playlist.

notSignedIn.message: You need to be signed in to create playlists
notSignedIn.solution: Click 'Sign In' in the top right corner and log into your Google account

playlistLimitReached.message: You've reached the maximum number of playlists
playlistLimitReached.solution: Delete some old playlists or upgrade to YouTube Premium

tips: Use descriptive names for your playlists to make them easy to find
You can reorder videos in playlists by dragging them
Playlists can be shared with others using the share button
You can collaborate on playlists with other users
